Hours of Beauty
Melbourne Gardens, Northampton First Contest organised by Northampton Temperance Brass Band Quickstep Contest for local bands 1st Prize Kettering Rifle 2nd Prize Rushden Temperance 3rd Prize Kettering Town Solo cornet contest after main contest. Entrants: W Smith - Oldham Rifle - 1st Prize T Young - Oldham Rifle J Shore - Oldham Rifle J W Foster - Kettering Rifle W Seddon - Kettering Rifle Reported in Northampton Herald, 29th August 1885 6 bands competed.
